name: BARTAdvisoryFlash
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: BART Advisory Flash pulls realtime advisory information from Bart, to give you the most up to date status in your Flash Briefing. No need to open a special app, just ask for the news.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
